mapper.select: select MAX(cid) AS cid from cases
mapper.insert: insert into cases( cid, platformId, caseStage, caseStatus, caseTitle, petitionDate, languageId, replyStartDate, replyEndDate ) values( #{cid}, #{platformId}, #{caseStage}, #{caseStatus}, #{caseTitle}, #{petitionDate,}, #{languageId}, #{replyStartDate}, #{replyEndDate} )
